thread.title: BRIEF-Michelin Provides Update On Its Financing Arrangements In Proposed Acquisition Of Fenner PLC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Michelin Provides Update On Its Financing Arrangements In Proposed Acquisition Of Fenner PLC

organizations.name: compagnie generale des etablissements michelin sca

text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Compagnie Generale des Etablissements Michelin SCA:
* MICHELIN : UPDATE ON MICHELIN’S FINANCING ARRANGEMENTS IN RELATION TO THE PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF FENNER PLC
* ON 6 APRIL 2018 ENTERED INTO A NEW COMMITTED CREDIT FACILITY WITH CRÉDIT AGRICOLE CORPORATE AND INVESTMENT BANK WHICH REPLACES INITIAL FACILITY
* ALL TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF ACQUISITION REMAIN UNCHANGED. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:, (Gdynia Newsroom)
